verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> with <S%G1683>myself,<s%> that I would <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3077>heaviness.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> make you <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he then that maketh me <S%G2165>glad,<s%> <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> the same which is made <S%G3076>sorry<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G1700>me?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3363>lest,<s%> when I <S%G2064>came,<s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the joy of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4928>anguish<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye should be <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> have caused <S%G3076>grief,<s%> he hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> in <S%G575>part:<s%> <S%G3313><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1912>overcharge<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>
Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> to such a <S%G5108>man<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2009>punishment,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was inflicted <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G4119>many.<s%>

So <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> ought <S%G3123>rather<s%> to <S%G5483>forgive<s%> him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> him, <S%G3381>lest<s%> perhaps such a <S%G5108>one<s%> should be swallowed <S%G2666>up<s%> with <S%G4055>overmuch<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> that ye would <S%G2964>confirm<s%> your <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> did I <S%G1125>write,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> To <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G5483>forgive<s%> any <S%G5100>thing,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> forgive <S%G2532>also:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> if I forgave any <S%G1536>thing,<s%> <S%G1473><s%> <S%G5483><s%> <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G5483>forgave<s%> it, for your <S%G1223>sakes<s%> <S%G5209><s%> forgave I it <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4383>person<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
Lest <S%G3363><s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> should get an <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of us: <S%G1063>for<s%> we are not <S%G50>ignorant<s%> <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3540>devices.<s%>

Furthermore, when I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> preach <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> in <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> because <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> taking my <S%G657>leave<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> I went from <S%G1831>thence<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be unto <S%G2316>God,<s%> which always causeth us to <S%G2358>triumph<s%> <S%G3842><s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> maketh <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3744>savor<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> a sweet <S%G2175>savor<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> them that are <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> them that perish: <S%G622><s%>

To the <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> we are the <S%G3744>savor<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> to the <S%G3739>other<s%> the <S%G3744>savor<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G2425>sufficient<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> these <S%G5023>things?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%> which <S%G2585>corrupt<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> in the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> we <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
